item.title: Using Python Math with Bayesian statistics just for fun
item.description: (org-babel-do-load-languages 'org-babel-load-languages '((python t))) from scipy.stats import binom x = [1] print(1-binom.cdf(1, 7, (1/5))) 1 k = 1, n = 12, p = 1/10 2 16 ways 3 0.0004548552879040868 4 0.2752512000000002 5 0.1877066233635499 More likely to get a job with just 7 interviews while not tired. import statistics as stats A = [2, 4, 6] B = stats.mean(A) print(B) th pyvenv I put (pyvenv-activate "~/src/moses-sk/.venv") at the top, and then just keep the same :session name in python blocks
